story.text: Jan 2 Hercules Offshore Inc. (HERO.O) said its Chief Financial Officer Steven Manz suffered an apparent stroke last week and that the company intended to appoint an interim CFO shortly. Manz is now recuperating at home, the company said in a statement. It is not possible to predict when he will be able to return to work, it added. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: hercules offshore says cfo ill ; to appoint interim cfo
